talks.label: Talks

talks.description: I speak at developer conferences and events about web development. If you are an event organizer looking for speakers, let's talk about it.

footer.title: Share the stage with me
footer.description: If you're an event organizer looking for speakers, a content creator looking for guests, or a student in a club looking for someone knowledgeable about software development, send me an email! I reply within the day.

projects.description: My most notable projects. Things that I am proud I made, or was involved in making. Work that I would love to do more of.

uses.description: Things I use and swear by. An archive of things I use and how I rate them.

videos.description: Videos of me doing… stuff. Not necessarily about tech and software.

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Initiating space beacon…
contact.description: Send me a message. I would love to hear from you! If you want me to join your team, commission my services for a project, invite me as a speaker in your event, or just for a chat, you can reach out to me through these links.

gallery.label: Gallery

gallery.description: Selfies. Blurry. Wacky. Photobombs. The whole she-bang.

threads.label: Social Media
threads.title: Thoughts from the Void
threads.description: Thoughts that I wanted to put out there but were too lazy to write longform. Opinions that would be otherwise too bland outside the confines of a character limit.

webmentions.label: Webmentions
webmentions.title: Shoutouts from the interwebs
webmentions.description: When I screamed into the void, the void screamed back. And these are what they had to say.

webring.label: Web Ring
webring.title: Pinoy Websites
webring.description: Pinoy Websites is a webring of Filipino people with blogs. Your blog can be about anything. It can be about design, development, architecture, medicine, cross-stitching, knitting, puzzles, travelling—anything!
